forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco greets us with a gentle ambiance, marked by the faint patter of early drizzle which should give way to an inviting sunlit canvas as the day unfolds. With a high cresting near 67 degrees, those venturing out should consider a light layering; a soft scarf and light jacket may serve well against the mellow west wind, bending through the streets at 7 to 15 mph, accentuated by occasional gusts that dance playfully along the waterfront. 

As the sun climbs higher, the skies promise a clearer enjoyment of one of San Francisco’s famed afternoons, the fog rolling back to reveal the glinting skyline and distant vistas. However, as day transitions to evening, the clouds will return, bringing the possibility of more patchy drizzle, so a prepared spirit for the evening's cool embrace is wise. Though this day allows for pleasant outings—perhaps a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or a visit to a chic café downtown—it's best to embrace the dynamic nature of the weather and carry an umbrella just in case.
